```{r}
#| context: server
box::use(
  R/data_processing,
  reactable[...],
 # shiny[...],
  htmltools[...]
  )

df <- data_processing$process_raw_war_data("data/Inter-StateWarData_v4.0.csv")

df <- data_processing$aggregate_war_data(df)
#
output$table <- renderReactable({
  reactable(
    df,
    
    columns = list(
      war_details = colDef(
        html = TRUE,
        align = "center"
      ),
      initiators = colDef(
        html = TRUE,
        align = "center"
        ),
      defenders = colDef(
        html = TRUE,
        align = "center"
      )
    )
  )
  })


```
